rows.label: tev011401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gerome about his past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gerome if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Gerome for his thoughts on
the xenoforms living in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gerome for his thoughts on the Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Gerome if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0001
rows.name:
The disaster occurred in the year 2054.
Earth was attacked by xenos, and the majority
of its surface was burnt to a crisp.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0002
rows.name:
To this day, no one understands why this tragedy
happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Why did two alien species decide to turn Earth into a
battlefield? Why did they hate us? We have no idea.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0004
rows.name:
The only thing we know for sure is that their
overwhelming assault claimed countless lives
and did incalculable damage to our world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0006
rows.name:
We lost so many people the day they attacked,
including my entire family! Damn them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0009
rows.name:
Coming here and having a pizza like this reminds me
of how my wife and daughter and I used to make
homemade pizza every year on Christmas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0010
rows.name:
Those goddamn xenos took everything from me.
The warmth of my wife... The smile of my daughter...
They took it all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0011
rows.name:
I'll never forgive 'em. And one day, I'll make them
experience every ounce of the pain they inflicted on me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Now we're making friendship treaties with xenos?
What the hell is Chausson thinking?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Thanks to that nonsense, the damn xenos have
completely taken over Army Pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0022
rows.name:
This is MY spot where I come to relax and remember
my wife and daughter! They loved pizza, dammit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0023
rows.name:
First the Ganglion takes out my family,
then xenos take over my last sanctuary on New LA.
The hell did I do to deserve this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0024
rows.name:
You better believe I'll be keeping an eye on these
xenos. The second I see one of 'em start acting fishy,
I'll kill it with my own two hands![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0038
rows.name:
So the Ganglion wasn't satisfied laying waste to the
Earth and slaughtering my family, were they?
Now they've come to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0039
rows.name: Numerous BLADEs lost their lives in defense of this city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0040
rows.name:
We're going to get the Ganglion for this.
We'll kill 10 of theirs for every one of ours![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Oh, and our Ma-non "allies"? Did you see any of them
fighting by our side? Because all I saw was them fleeing
to their ship while we fought and DIED![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0042
rows.name:
How long is Chausson gonna let them walk all over us,
huh? Does he even KNOW?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0043
rows.name:
And how long will we have to protect those damned
layabouts with our own human lives?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0046
rows.name:
Now I'm hearing they let one of those Ma-non become
a BLADE! I'd expect this sort of crap from Chausson,
but Vandham should be ashamed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Isn't anyone worried that the Ma-non might be spying
for the Ganglion? THINK ABOUT IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0048
rows.name:
I hear that Ma-non BLADE joined the Mediators and
has been stationed in the commercial district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev011401_MSG0049
rows.name:
I'll never accept a goddamn Ma-non BLADE.
No way, no how, no sir![ST:wait ]
